about.title: KOMPANIYA HAQIDA
about.desc: It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable English. Many desktop publishing packages and web page editors now use Lorem Ipsum as their default model text, and a search for 'lorem ipsum' will uncover many web sites still in their infancy. Various versions have evolved over the years, sometimes by accident, sometimes on purpose

vacancies_form.title: Ariza qoldirish
vacancies_form.desc: Bizning HR mutaxassislarimiz olingan barcha rezyumelarni diqqat bilan ko'rib chiqadilar. Sizning ish tajribangiz, ko'nikma va malakalaringiz hozirda mavjud bo'sh ish o'rinlari talablariga javob bermasa ham, biz sizning rezyumeingizni albatta ma'lumotlar bazamizga qo'shamiz va mos narsa paydo bo'lganda siz bilan bog'lanamiz.
vacancies_form.name: Ism Familya
vacancies_form.file_input_text1: Drag files here or click to select files
vacancies_form.file_input_text2: Attach as many files as you like, each file should not exceed 5mb
